page.title: 05Durweston School:Our Homes 1
page.content: Every person in our class took home a sheet containing questions about their homes. When they were returned we made a chart about them and this is what we found: { { Walls } We discovered that brick is the most popular building material used for our houses. There are 18 brick houses and 2 that aren't. {Roofs} There were 13 tiled roofs, 6 slate roofs and 1 thatched. We weren't very surprised because tiles and slate are more modern. {Built} There were 9 of our houses built in the 20th century, 4 in the 19th century and 2 in the 18th century.
